elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Find out why there is closer economic cooperation between the cantons in Switzerland today than there is between the member states of the EU.

elements.name: Frage 1
elements.title: Mark the correct reason.
choices: Because the core EU - unlike Switzerland - is not a complete monetary union.
Because the EU - unlike Switzerland - is not a complete economic union.
Because the UK has left the EU.
elements.correctAnswer: Because the EU - unlike Switzerland - is not a complete economic union.

elements.name: panel1
elements.title: The Swiss cantons use all forms of economic cooperation among themselves. However, Switzerland works less closely with the EU. How can you tell?

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Mark the correct reason.

choices.text: Switzerland has no access to the European free trade area.
choices.value: Switzerland has no access to the European free trade area.

choices.text: Switzerland does not form a customs, currency and economic union with the EU.
choices.value: Switzerland does not form a customs, currency and economic union with the EU.

choices.text: Switzerland only exports machines and watches to the EU.
choices.value: Switzerland only exports machines and watches to the EU.

elements.correctAnswer: Switzerland does not form a customs, currency and economic union with the EU.
